$MSFT People in the apple room are panicking and I don't get it. This is normal behaviour in the stock market. Just remember what Buffet once said: "The stock market is a transation between the impatient to the patient investor". Just go with the flow.
Panicking only suits better short term investors. The long ones should relax and drink tea. Or buy more stocks.
